#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define ll long long int

ll INF=(ll) (1e9*1e9);
ll dp[200005],A[200005];

ll min(ll a,ll b) {
if(a<b)
return a;
else
return b;
}

ll absolute(ll a) {
if(a>0)
return a;
else
return -a;
}

int main() {

int N,i,j;
cin>>N;

for(i=1;i<=N;i++) {
cin>>A[i];
dp[i]=INF;
}

dp[1]=0;

for(i=1;i<=N;i++) 
for(j=1;i+j<=N;j*=2) { 
dp[i+j]=min(dp[i+j] , dp[i] + absolute(A[i+j]-A[i]) );
}

cout<<dp[N]<<"\n";

return 0;
}
